regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re, requests, unwise source = requests.get('https://www.canlitv.today/yayinim.php?kanal=cartoon-network', headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','referer':'https://www.canlitv.today/'}).text while 'w,i,s,e' in source: source=unwise.unwise_process(source) link = re.findall('attr\("src", "(.*?)"',source, re.DOTALL)[0] return link
